alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 645 PM MST... At 600 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bouse, or 19 miles southeast of Parker, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and generate blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Parker, Bouse and Buckskin Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 33. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 131 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
